items.title: Surviving Twin Flame Separations and Breakups
items.headline: Skills that will help you move on, resolve your soul contract and thrive after a twin flame or twin soul relationship.
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of what a twin flame relationship is and common themes
Decide if you should end things with your twin
Discover the many lessons from your relationship

objectives_summary: How to support reading development in your child aged 2 to 5
How to develop your child's phonological awareness
How to teach your child to read

items.title: The Love Challenge

visible_instructors.name: Jed
visible_instructors.job_title: Your highly-caffinated, relationship and parenting coach!
visible_instructors.title: Jed Jurchenko

items.headline: Grow your relationship and deepen your love with this ten-day, connection challenge for individuals and couples.
objectives_summary: Students will learn what lovemaps are, why they are important, and practice updating their love maps.
Students will learn why focusing on the positive moments in their relationship is important and practice this in The Reminiscing Challenge.
Students will increase their momentum and take control of their attitudes by turning their attention to the positive moments in their lives.

items.title: How to Manage Autism Calmly over Christmas
items.headline: Discover how to reduce your child's anxieties that can lead to challenging behaviour and meltdowns over Christmas
objectives_summary: You will know how to help your child reduce the frequency and the severity of meltdowns over Christmas, because you will have a much greater understanding of what causes them and why they happen. You will also have a virtual toolbox of strategies to de-escalate meltdowns if they do occur, as well as a deeper understanding of what autism is, and how it affects our children. You will also gain the skills to develop your own ability to cope much better with the demands that autism can bring to parenting, as well as the essential self-care skills and knowledge of how important it is to find time to look after yourself.

items.title: The Parenting Breakthrough Experience
items.headline: Be the change you want to see in your kids.
objectives_summary: Know what your purpose is and how to link this to everything you do for an inspiring, gratitude filled life
Know how to stop repeating negative cycles in your life
Understand and be able to manage stress in your life and parenting

items.title: Understanding Children and Technology
items.headline: One of the best courses on child development and technology on the market. Best content presented by real professionals
objectives_summary: Understand children and their world
Understand and use technology in a creative way
Develop new ways to respond to children's needs

items.title: Neuroscience for Parents: Happy parents, happier kids

visible_instructors.name: Ina
visible_instructors.job_title: Mind mapping, Memory Improvement, Brain Training Coach
visible_instructors.title: Ina Ilie

items.headline: Parenting 2.0. Healing your past wounds, managing stressful situations as parents, parenting with calm, love, acceptance
objectives_summary: The skills to be HAPPY PARENTS. The skills to be a happier parent are usually overlooked, because the child gets the attention in most parenting courses.
Identify the causes that trigger your specific reactions and patterns as a parent, learn how to separate yourself from the traumas of your past.
How to approach unpleasant situations and how to react to difficult parenting circumstances. What causes your child’s action, particularly the ones that “drive you crazy”.

items.title: How to Quickly Stop or Prevent Tantrums

visible_instructors.name: Madeleine
visible_instructors.job_title: Mother, Peaceful Parenting Counselor, Advocate, and Teacher
visible_instructors.title: Madeleine Atchley

items.headline: A Proven Blueprint to Eliminate Tantrums, and Help Your Child Become an Effective and Calm Communicator
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will have a proven blueprint to ending tantrums forever with this information packed series of lectures. Your course trainer, peaceful parenting advocate / teacher Madeleine Atchley, has proven with countless children over the past decade that the cycle of tantrums can be broken in a few days with any child. You will walk with her, step by step, through this profoundly effective process that will empower you to break the tantrum cycle forever.
